title: Citadel’s Sticky Employee Pay Weighed on $5.3 Billion Gains
description: Employee pay at Ken Griffin’s Citadel held fast last year despite lower returns, underscoring the burdensome costs that come with running giant multistrategy hedge funds amid a heated fight for talent.
content: Employee pay at Ken Griffin’s Citadel held fast last year despite lower returns, underscoring the burdensome costs that come with running giant multistrategy hedge funds amid a heated fight for talent.
